entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 04:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: ENE 54 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
